conbody.p: A Filter Criteria takes place when designing a search function. It represents the dynamic part of the search screen where end-user enters criteria. A Filter Criteria references a piece of code packaged with Triple'A Plus.

When dropped in the page editor, the Filter Criteria is represented by a three lines of criteria. This is a picture symbolizing search input. This is not the exact final presentation but a simple static picture to be considered as a preview.

The Filter Criteria widget
can only be dropped into a module qualified as Container and Search Input. Only one Filter Criteria can be dropped into such a module, or one on each tab if module contains a tabbed pane.
